title: Croix de Culet
text:
The Croix de Culet is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Chablais%20Alps">Chablais Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Champ%C3%A9ry">Champéry</a> in the canton of <a href="Valais">Valais</a>. It lies between the valleys of <a href="Les%20Crosets">Les Crosets</a> and Planachaux.
The summit can by reached by cable car from Champéry. In winter the mountain is part of the ski area <a href="Portes%20du%20Soleil">Portes du Soleil</a>.
